battle_traits.name: Trampling Charge
battle_traits.description: At the first opportunity, an ogor will barge into combat, using its immense girth as a weapon.
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Ogor or Rhinox unit that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battle_traits.name: Ravenous Brutes
battle_traits.description: Sighting the enemy, the ogors' hunger intensifies, and they move with alarming speed to close the distance.
battle_traits.effect: Add 2 to run rolls for friendly Ogor units while you have not used the 'Feast on Flesh' ability this battle.

battle_traits.name: Feast On Flesh
battle_traits.description: As the battlelines clash and blood is spilled, the ogors' hunger must be sated, and they are compelled to gorge on the flesh of their enemies.
battle_traits.declare: Pick each friendly Ogor unit that is in combat or that used a Fight ability this turn to be the targets.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+: * Heal (X) the target, where X is an amount equal to the roll. * Pick an enemy unit in combat with the target. You cannot pick the same enemy unit more than once. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

Prophets Of The \nGulping God.name: Master Butchers
Prophets Of The \nGulping God.description: These ogor shamans know many gruesome secrets of gastromantic magic.
Prophets Of The \nGulping God.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly Ogor Mawtribes Wizards.

Heralds Of The \nEverwinter.name: Eyes Of The Stor M
Heralds Of The \nEverwinter.description: The members of this tribe are masked by frosty squalls and freezing mists as they follow their champions into battle.
Heralds Of The \nEverwinter.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly Ogor Mawtribes Infantry units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly Beastclaw Raiders Heroes.

Beast Handlers.name: Brutal Stock
Beast Handlers.description: The beasts of this tribe are said to be the most belligerent and tenacious of all their kind.
Beast Handlers.effect: Each time a friendly Beastclaw Raiders Monster uses the 'Trampling Charge' ability, add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any.

Blackpowder Fanatics.name: Feed Yer Cannons!
Blackpowder Fanatics.description: These artillery- ogors don't need to be told twice to blast the foe into tiny bits.
Blackpowder Fanatics.effect: Ranged weapons used by friendly Leadbelchers and Ironblaster units have Shoot in Combat while they are within the combat range of a friendly Ogor Mawtribes Hero.

heroic_traits.name: Great Gutlord
heroic_traits.description: There are few opponents in the Mortal Realms that can withstand the ravenous power of this ogor.
heroic_traits.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to this unit's control score and to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unit's attacks.

heroic_traits.name: Booming Roar
heroic_traits.description: Relishing the fight, this champion roars a challenge to the enemy that makes the very earth beneath their feet tremble.
heroic_traits.effect: Subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy Infantry units while they are in combat with this unit.

heroic_traits.name: Touched By The Everwinter
heroic_traits.description: This warrior strayed close to the heart of the Everwinter and emerged with the power to commune with it.
heroic_traits.effect: If this unit is not a Priest, it has Priest (1). If this unit is already a Priest, you can re-roll chanting rolls of 1 for it instead. If this unit is a Wizard, it cannot use Spell abilities and Prayer abilities in the same phase.

artefacts_of_power.name: Gruesome Trophies
artefacts_of_power.description: This collection of skulls, entrails and hides is an inspiring sight to this ogor's kin, encouraging them to claim trophies of their own.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks that target Heroes or Monsters made by friendly Ogor Mawtribes units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

artefacts_of_power.name: The Fang Of Ghur
artefacts_of_power.description: The amber magic that permeates this weapon grants it the power to bite through arcane wards.
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for the target for the rest of the turn.

artefacts_of_power.name: Elixir Of The Frostw Yr M
artefacts_of_power.description: Distilled from the blood of a giant Frostwyrm, this rare elixir temporarily gives the drinker the power of those beasts to vomit forth a torrent of frost magic.
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Roll a dice. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, Heal (X) this unit, where X is an amount equal to the roll.

Lore Of Maw-Magic.name: Troggoth Guts
Lore Of Maw-Magic.description: The shaman gobbles down the slippery innards of a troggoth to transfer the beast's uncanny healing powers to their allies and restore their vigour.
Lore Of Maw-Magic.declare: Pick a friendly Ogor Mawtribes Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Ogor Mawtribes unit within 12" of them that has not been picked to be the target of this ability this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Maw-Magic.effect: Heal (D3) the target and add 3 to the target's control score for the rest of the turn.

Lore Of Maw-Magic.name: Greasy Deluge
Lore Of Maw-Magic.description: The caster chews up a big mouthful of rancid fat and gall-slime before spitting it onto the ground. In moments, enemy warriors are caught in a deluge of foul-smelling grease, slipping and sliding as they try to bring their weapons to bear.
Lore Of Maw-Magic.declare: Pick a friendly Ogor Mawtribes Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Maw-Magic.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks until the start of your next turn.

Lore Of Maw-Magic.name: Blood Feast
Lore Of Maw-Magic.description: The liver of a powerful beast is held high over the shaman's head. Gore drips and runs down their face before they take a great bite from it, filling nearby ogors with a frenzied blood-lust.
Lore Of Maw-Magic.declare: Pick a friendly Ogor Mawtribes Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Ogor Infantry unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Maw-Magic.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target's melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

Everwinter Prayers.name: Call Of The Blizzard
Everwinter Prayers.description: An impenetrable snow squall manifests on the battlefield, An impenetrable snow squall manifests on the battlefield, blocking visibility and shielding nearby Beastclaw warriors.
Everwinter Prayers.declare: Pick a friendly Ogor Mawtribes Priest to chant this prayer, pick a terrain feature within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Everwinter Prayers.effect: Place a blizzard token next to the target. Terrain features that have a blizzard token gain the 'Obscuring' terrain ability. In addition, if the chanting roll was 10+, until the start of your next turn, friendly Beastclaw Raiders units have Ward (5+) while they are within 3" of any terrain features that have blizzard tokens.

Everwinter Prayers.name: Pulverising Hailstor M
Everwinter Prayers.description: Fist-sized chunks of ice rain from the sky to crush those below.
Everwinter Prayers.declare: Pick a friendly Ogor Mawtribes Priest to chant this prayer, pick a point on the battlefield within 12" of them, then pick each visible enemy unit within 3" of that point to be the targets. Then, make a chanting roll of D6.
Everwinter Prayers.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the chanting roll was 10+, double the amount of mortal damage inflicted.

Everwinter Prayers.name: Keening Gale
Everwinter Prayers.description: A bone-chilling wind howls across the battlefield, giving speed to the beasts of winter and driving the Everwinter's monstrous denizens before it.
Everwinter Prayers.declare: Pick a friendly Ogor Mawtribes Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly Ogor Mawtribes Monster or Mournfang Pack unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Everwinter Prayers.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target can use a Run ability and still use Charge abilities later in the turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, you can re-roll run rolls and charge rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged The Shield Inviolate
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per Spell ability.
abilities.description: Tuskbreaker has the power to guard Kragnos against even the most potent magical force.

abilities.name: Avatar Of Destruction
abilities.description: Kragnos is the embodiment of Ghur's relentless ferocity. No single strike can lay him low.
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction
abilities.description: Kragnos rampages through the press of his foes, his hooves flattening all in his path.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects: * Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll. * Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 × 6).

abilities.name: The End Of Empires
abilities.description: Where Kragnos goes, the hordes of Destruction follow.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly Destruction units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Bully Of The First Degree
abilities.description: Tyrants use constant violence to help them maintain an iron rule, and they never let their underlings forget it.
abilities.declare: Pick another friendly Ogor Mawtribes unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the target's control score until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Brawlerguts
abilities.description: Combining brutish strength with devastating bulk, this ogor enters combat like an avalanche.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the D3 roll made when this unit uses the 'Trampling Charge' ability.

abilities.name: Fill The Pot
abilities.description: As enemies are cut down by the ogors, the Slaughtermaster collects their remains to fill his cauldron.
abilities.effect: Each time an enemy unit is destroyed by a combat attack made by a friendly Ogor Mawtribes unit wholly within 18" of this unit, give this unit a grisly remains point, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Great Cauldron
abilities.description: Lashed to a Slaughtermaster is a great cauldron containing the remains of foes, which the ogor gobbles down in order to unleash gastromantic powers.
abilities.effect: You can spend 1 or more of this unit's grisly remains points. For each point spent, pick a friendly Gutbusters unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then pick 1 of the following effects: Bloodgruel: The target has Ward (5+) for the rest of the turn. Spinemarrow: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target's melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Savage Hunger
abilities.description: The Butcher stokes the hunger of a group of nearby ogors, causing even slight belly-rumbles to erupt into the nigh-uncontrollable desire to feast.
abilities.effect: While they are wholly within 12" of this unit, friendly Gutbusters units can use Charge abilities even if they used a Run ability in the same turn.

melee.name: Hacker-axe and Meatblade
melee.ability: Anti-Monster (+1 Rend) (+1 Rend) (+1 Rend) (+1 Rend) (+1 Rend)

abilities.name: Beast-Breaker
abilities.description: Bloodpelt Hunters will seek out the largest creatures in battle, slaying them and devouring their still- warm flesh.
abilities.effect: If the target is a Monster, the Damage characteristic of this unit's Skullshatter Crossbow is 3 and the Damage characteristic of its Impaling Spear is 6.

abilities.name: Unrelenting Hunter
abilities.description: With brutish cunning, Bloodpelt Hunters relentlessly track their quarry, always making sure they stay one step ahead.
abilities.effect: If this unit is more than 9" from all enemy units, it can use the 'Normal Move' ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: Insatiable Gluttony
abilities.description: Once Gluttons have started eating, it is nearly impossible to shift them.
abilities.effect: If you have used the 'Feast on Flesh' ability this battle, add 1 to the control score of this unit for each model in this unit.

abilities.name: Protect The Tyrant
abilities.description: Ironguts have risen through the tribe's ranks not only by amassing status and equipment but also by earning the favour of their Tyrant.
abilities.effect: While this unit is within the combat ranges of any friendly Tyrants, both this unit and those Tyrants have Ward (6+).

abilities.name: Down To The Ironguts
abilities.description: It is not often that a mawtribe's battleline falters, but if it does, the Tyrant will call upon their Ironguts to turn the battle back in their favour.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 Fight abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.reaction_condition: This unit was picked as the target of a non-Core ability
abilities.name: Been There, Done That
abilities.description: Having travelled the realms and eaten every conceivable foe, Maneaters just laugh off the puny tricks and magics of their enemies.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

melee.name: Clubs, Claws and Jaws
melee.ability: Anti-Anti-Anti-Infantry Infantry (+1 Rend) Infantry (+1 Rend) (+1 Rend)

abilities.name: Troglodytic Lurkers
abilities.description: Gorgers are shunned and reviled creatures. When a mawtribe goes to war, they often lurk on the edge of the battlefield, waiting to strike.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve lurking on the fringes. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Frenzied Hunters
abilities.description: Overwhelmed with bloodlust, the Gorger Mawpack launch themselves from their hiding place in a futile frenzy to end their eternal hunger.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is lurking on the fringes.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit on the battlefield wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Firing From The Belly
abilities.description: An ogor's sturdy frame easily absorbs the recoil of even cannon-sized weapons.
abilities.effect: If this unit has not used a Move ability this turn and was not set up this turn, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit's shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Powder Gnoblars
abilities.description: When assisted by a Gnoblar minion, Leadbelchers can cause even more carnage.
abilities.effect: This unit has up to 2 Powder Gnoblar tokens. Each time this unit uses a Shoot ability, for each of this unit's Powder Gnoblars that are on the battlefield, you can re-roll 1 random characteristic roll for this unit's Attacks characteristic. If a random characteristic roll re-rolled in this manner is 1, remove 1 of this unit's Powder Gnoblars from the battlefield.

abilities.name: Lethal Payload
abilities.description: An Ironblaster's rifled barrel can be loaded with projectiles that fill its copious width or with several smaller cannonballs to cover a wider area.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a Shoot ability, pick either the Big Shot or Hail Shot weapon characteristics for all the attacks it makes with its Ironblaster Cannon.

abilities.name: Load It Up!
abilities.description: Gnoblars close to a Scraplauncher will diligently scavenge any nearby scrap to pile upon the catapult. After all, looking busy is a good way to avoid getting stepped on by an angry ogor!
abilities.effect: If this unit is within the combat range of a friendly Gnoblars unit, this unit's shooting attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Rain Of Scrap
abilities.description: Salvaged weapons and shards of metal rain down upon the enemy, forcing them to take cover or dodge out of the way.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any models slain this turn by this unit's shooting attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Nasty Traps And Tricks
abilities.description: These cunning creatures specialise in fighting dirty and laying all manner of lethal and cunning traps.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit and that used a Move ability this turn to be the target. You cannot pick the same unit to be the target of this ability more than once per turn.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Stonehorn's Rock-hard Horns is 4.

abilities.name: Earth-Shattering Charge
abilities.description: Enemies are crushed and trampled beneath the unstoppable ferocity of a Frostlord upon a charging Stonehorn.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, roll 2D6. This unit can move a distance up to the value of the roll. During that move, it can pass through models in the target unit but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Frost Spear
abilities.description: Blessed by the Everwinter, the bite of this ogor's Frost Spear chills the enemy with crippling cold.
abilities.effect: If any damage points are allocated to an enemy Hero or Monster by attacks made with this unit's Frost Spear, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of that enemy unit's melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Stone Skeleton
abilities.description: The thick, rock- like skeletons of these beasts can take substantial punishment.
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit in each phase.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Thundertusk's Colossal Tusks is 2.

abilities.name: Sweeping Tusks
abilities.description: With a deafening bellow, the Thundertusk swings its huge frost-wreathed tusks from side to side, sending enemies flying.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Bellowing Voice
abilities.description: With their booming voice, the Frostlord signals the hunt.
abilities.declare: Pick any number of friendly Beastclaw Raiders units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Each target can add 1 to the D3 roll made if that unit uses the 'Trampling Charge' ability this turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Stonehorn's Rock-hard Horns is 4.

abilities.name: Stone Skeleton
abilities.description: The thick, rock- like skeletons of these beasts can take substantial punishment.
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit in each phase.

abilities.name: Everwinter'S Goad
abilities.description: This ogor's Stonehorn unleashes a mighty roar that drives nearby monsters into a frenzy.
abilities.declare: Pick each friendly and enemy Monster within this unit's combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+: * If the target is a friendly Ogor Mawtribes unit, its Companion weapons have Crit (2 Hits) for the rest of the turn. * If the target is an enemy unit, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with its Companion weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Thundertusk's Colossal Tusks is 2.

abilities.name: Freezing Aura
abilities.description: Winter storms gather about this Huskard, freezing and slowing those foolish enough to close in on them on foot.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target had Strike-last as a result of this ability in the previous turn. On a 4+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Stonehorn's Rock-hard Horns is 4.

abilities.name: Stone Skeleton
abilities.description: The thick, rock- like skeletons of these beasts can take substantial punishment.
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit in each phase.

abilities.name: Stonehorn Avalanche
abilities.description: With hearty roars, the Beastriders pick their target and send their Stonehorn crashing forward with the force of a mountain's worth of snow and rock.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, when this unit makes a pile-in move this phase, add D6" to the distance it can move.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Thundertusk's Colossal Tusks is 2.

abilities.name: Everwinter'S Assault
abilities.description: The enemy are left scattered and reeling before the combination of the Thundertusk's charge and the great missiles loosed by its riders, forced to give ground until they can regather their wits.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn: * If the target is a Monster, subtract 3 from its control score. * If the target is a non-Monster unit, subtract 5 from its control score.

abilities.name: Masters Of Ambush
abilities.description: Always on the move, Icebrow Hunters range ahead of the main ogor force alongside packs of trained Frost Sabres.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly Frost Sabres units if those units have not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up those units in reserve outflanking the prey. They have now been deployed.

abilities.name: The Hunt Is On
abilities.description: Sensing the time is right, the Icebrow Hunter and their Frost Sabre companions launch their ambush.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is outflanking the prey.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, set up each Frost Sabres unit that was set up outflanking the prey with this unit wholly within 12" of it and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Hunters Of The Frozen Wilds
abilities.description: The coats of Frost Sabres act as a natural camouflage in the bleak wilderness.
abilities.effect: This unit is not visible to enemy units while it is within 3" of a terrain feature and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Lumpen Wall Of Flesh
abilities.description: Mournfangs and their riders provide a living shield for the other ogors, soaking up and foiling incoming ranged fire with their thick, furry hides and broad profiles.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly Beastclaw Raiders units while they are within this unit's combat range.

abilities.name: Alpha Cavalry
abilities.description: Those Mournfangs that have risen to the top of the fighting pits have done so by repeatedly charging equally massive rivals head-on and coming out on top.
abilities.effect: The Charge (+1 Damage) weapon ability has no effect on attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Torrent Of Flame
abilities.description: Fiery morsels are consumed by this ogor moments before they spew a torrent of flames at the enemy.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's Fire Breath for attacks that target Infantry.

abilities.name: Bounding Leaps
abilities.description: Adapted to an environment of plunging chasms and sheer cliffs, Icefall Yhetees possess long limbs with corded strength that see them close the distance to their prey in a single mighty bound.
abilities.effect: This unit can move up to 3". It can move into combat.

abilities.name: Great Mawpot
abilities.description: All manner of ingredients are thrown into this metal cauldron and boiled up into a thick magical broth that reinvigorates any ogors who taste it.
abilities.effect: The Great Mawpot is either full or empty. It starts the battle full.

abilities.name: Throw 'Em In
abilities.description: The bludgeoned and hacked remains of dead foes are thrown into the bubbling cauldron to thicken the stew.
abilities.effect: If an enemy model is slain within 6" of the Great Mawpot when it is empty, it becomes full.

abilities.name: Vessel Of The Gulping God
abilities.description: Swirling gastromantic fumes emanate from the Great Mawpot when it is full to the brim.
abilities.declare: If the Great Mawpot is full, pick a friendly Ogor Wizard within 3" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the power level of the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Battlebroth
abilities.description: The contents of the Mawpot are suffused with strange magic; a single mouthful can restore an ogor's vitality and stitch up their wounds.
abilities.effect: If the Great Mawpot is full, Heal (D3) each friendly unit wholly within 18" of it. After you have done so, the Great Mawpot is empty.

abilities.name: Altar Of The Gulping God
abilities.description: A Mawpit is a tooth-lined sinkhole in which the aggressive nature of Ghur has become manifest. They are used a places of worship by the ogors, who constantly hurl gory sacrifices into their chomping orifices.
abilities.effect: While this terrain feature has a Head Butcher: * The Head Butcher cannot use Move abilities. * Instead of measuring range or visibility to the Head Butcher, measure to this terrain feature instead. * All attacks that would target the Head Butcher target this terrain feature instead. * If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Head Butcher. Then, set up the Head Butcher on the battlefield wholly within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Head Butcher. If it is not possible to set up the Head Butcher, it is slain.

abilities.name: Feed The Maw
abilities.description: The new Head Butcher ascends the platform above the Mawpit.
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have a Head Butcher, pick a friendly Butcher or Slaughtermaster within 3" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now a Head Butcher (see 'Altar of the Gulping God').

abilities.name: Step Away From The Maw
abilities.description: The Head Butcher descends from the platform.
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has a Head Butcher, set up the Head Butcher on the battlefield wholly within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Head Butcher.

abilities.name: Throat Of Ghur
abilities.description: With a rumble, smaller Mawpits suddenly manifest beneath the feet of distant foes.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 12" of this terrain feature, or within 18" if it has a Head Butcher, to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. Add 1 to the roll if the target is more than 3" from all other enemy units. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
